tasks.label: check-static-files
args: $src = Join-Path $env:WORKSPACE_FOLDER 'src'; $index = Join-Path $src 'index.html'; $notFound = Join-Path $src '404.html'; if (!(Test-Path $index)) { Write-Host 'Warning: index.html was not found inside src.' }; if (!(Test-Path $notFound)) { Write-Host 'Warning: 404.html was not found inside src.' }

tasks.label: check-wrangler
args: if (-not (Get-Command wrangler -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Write-Host 'Warning: Wrangler is not installed. Please install it globally with npm install -g wrangler.'; exit 1 }
